p: Memantine, an antagonist of Î±7-nAChR and NMDA receptors may lessen ACE2 receptors expression and reduce oxidative stress and inflammation [ 51]. Early treatment with anti-oxidants such as N-acetyl cysteine during COVID-19 can be a way to control the excessive inflammation and cell damage [ 40]. Various randomized controlled trials, pilot studies, case reports and in vitro and in vivo studies confirmed that Nigella sativa (black cumin seeds) that showed antiviral, antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, immunomodulatory, bronchodilatory, antihistaminic, antitussive activities, could be considered as an adjuvant therapy along with repurposed conventional drugs for management of COVID-19 patients [ 100]. It further renders the importance of homocysteine-dependent trans-sulfuration pathway in COVID-19 infection. Hence, Vitamin B6, folic acid, and Vitamin B12 should also be included in the treatment regimen for SARS CoV-2 infections [ 101].
